title: Barry Diller’s IAC Reaches Deal to Buy Magazine Publisher Meredith
sub_head: The roughly $2.7 billion deal will combine brands like People, Better Homes & Gardens and Investopedia
body:
Barry Diller’s IAC/InterActiveCorp. has reached a roughly $2.7 billion deal to buy magazine publisher Meredith Corp. , a bet on online publishing that will combine brands like People, Better Homes & Gardens and Investopedia.
The Wall Street Journal had reported both companies were in advanced talks last month.
